channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: GOP Chairman Demands Info From 14 Agencies On Biden’s Taxpayer-Funded GOTV Efforts To Boost Dems
item.description: 'Federal funds should not have been used to influence our elections,' said GOP Rep. Bryan Steil.

item.title: Trump rescinds Biden-era policy declaring DEI an 'integral' part of scientific process
item.description: The Trump administration has rescinded the National Institute of Health's Biden-era "Scientific Integrity Policy" as part of a larger effort to root o...

item.title: SCOTUS’ Refusal To Rein In Rogue Lower Courts Has Become A Disturbing Pattern
item.description: The Supreme Court has become a paper tiger, failing to hold defiant lower courts accountable when they make rogue decisions.

item.title: Dem senator on Schumer future: 'Important' to know 'when it's time to go'
item.description: Sen. Michael Bennet, D-Colo., appeared less than confident in Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., during a town hall, remarking on the impor...

item.title: A Tale of Two Deportation Cases
item.description: In the case of the Venezuelans, the DOJ is resisting the kind of meticulous review that it provided in Mahmoud Khalil’s case.

item.title: It’s Time For Congress To Stop The Judicial Sabotage Of Trump’s Agenda
item.description: If Republicans are behind Trump, as they say they are, they need to prove it now.

item.title: Republicans, Don’t Buy Democrats’ Lies About Medicaid ‘Cuts’
item.description: Democrats call any reduction in government spending a 'cut.' Republicans shouldn't fall for it.

item.title: Thoughts on Federal Arts Money After President Autopen
item.description: And why wallop libraries? They teach people to think for themselves.

item.title: Feds making more than 300 payments a day in USAID funds after court battle

item.title: The Most Important China Book of the Decade
item.description: Tom Cotton brings to a mass audience a critical message about Beijing’s threats.

item.title: Wisconsin’s Susan Crawford Donated To Democrat Fundraising Giant Under Fire For Alleged Fraud
item.description: FEC records appear to show that Susan Crawford gave numerous small-dollar donations to ActBlue during her time as a private lawyer.

item.description: President Trump is urging the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates earlier in the year to "ease" the economy into his system of tariffs on foreign go...

item.title: Dean Phillips calls out 'great way to lose even more Democrats' as Tim Walz bashes Elon Musk
item.description: Former Rep. Dean Phillips, a Democrat, suggested that calling Elon Musk a "'South African nepo baby', is a great way to lose even more Democrats."

item.title: As nuclear waste piles up, Congress is at a standoff over where to store it

item.title: Pro-Union Republicans Don’t Get Trump’s Real Appeal
item.description: Democrats have lost the working class in large part because they put unions over workers. Republicans shouldn’t make the same mistake.

item.title: An Unwelcome Fight Over Obeying Court Orders
item.description: Even the righteous cause of deporting brutal Venezuelan gangs should not tempt the executive branch to undermine the legitimate role of courts.
